Prerequisite: Dex 13

Benefit: You can draw a weapon (or an object, such as a potion, stored in a belt pouch, a bandolier, or a similar container) as part of the same action used to attack with the weapon or use the object.

You also gain a +2 feat bonus to initiative checks.

Revision (7/28/2008)

Move phrase "such as a potion" after the word "object" in parentheses in 1st sentence of Benefits.

Move comma to before & after "such as a positon.

Addition (7/28/2008)

Add "a " before "bandolier" & "similar" in first sentence of Benefits line.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 200.
